ingredients.ingredient: 4 sheets (8x12-inches each) Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil
2 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bars, divided in half diagonally

cookingTips: Seal foil packets tightly to trap heat and melt chocolate evenly
Place packets on grill grates for 3-4 minutes, turning occasionally
Let packets cool slightly before opening to avoid burns from steam
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Want to elevate s'mores? Consider upgrades like dark chocolate or gourmet marshmallows—what variations appeal to you?
